meta.title: Front Runners - Learn Together. Grow Together.
meta.description: Front Runners helps organizations structurally grow towards better employership.

hero.title: Learn together.
hero.subtitle: Front Runners helps organizations – through learning, connection, and practice – structurally grow towards better employership.

why.title: Why Front Runners?
why.subtitle: We believe that employership will become the distinguishing force in the coming years. We believe that good employership is no longer a side issue, but a strategic prerequisite for remaining future-proof as an organization.

future.title: Future-focused
future.description: No audits or judgment about the current situation; the focus is on development direction and continuous learning.

businesscase.title: Annual Business Case
businesscase.description: One concrete business case that you develop and implement as an organization. This makes growth tangible.

community.title: Learning Community
community.description: Inspiration through company visits, roundtables, peer-learning, and keynotes. Together we are stronger.

recognition.title: Unique Recognition
recognition.description: Earn points for your business case, effort and growth, and receive official Front Runners Recognition.

program.title: A Year of Growth
program.subtitle: The Front Runners annual program is designed to stimulate continuous development without overloading daily operations.

online.title: Online Learning Environment
online.description: Access to AI modules, AI frameworks, templates, and the exclusive community forum.

offline.title: Learning Sessions
offline.description: At least 4 practical HR masterclasses per year with guest speakers from top organizations.

events.title: Community & Events
events.description: Company visits, roundtables, theme sessions, and HR masterclasses.

recognition.title: The Recognition
recognition.subtitle: Earn points through the business case and active participation in the program. With sufficient points, your organization receives official Front Runners Recognition.

bronze.name: Bronze
bronze.description: Your organization demonstrably actively participates in the program and has developed a coherent, substantiated business case that meets the basic criteria.

silver.name: Silver
silver.description: Your organization makes a consistent and active contribution to the program and has a well-developed business case with clear analysis, choices, and learning objectives.

gold.name: Gold
gold.description: Your organization distinguishes itself through a high degree of involvement and a strong, high-quality business case that leads to concrete and measurable improvements in employership.

platinum.name: Platinum
platinum.description: Your organization belongs to the leading group of participants and combines exceptional involvement with an excellent business case that demonstrably has impact and is directional for other organizations within the program.

cta.title: Ready to take the next step?
cta.subtitle: Join the front runners of tomorrow. Start your growth path towards better employership today.

footer.tagline: The program for organizations that want to invest in learning, HR development, and modern employership.

modal.subtitle: Fill in your details and receive our brochure with all information about the Front Runners program.
